function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of historical vector control knowledge","Impact":"Inability to learn from past successes and failures in vector control","Mitigation":"Documentation of historical vector control methods and their outcomes","Technologies":"Historical records, archives, and databases","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers, and vector control experts","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of disease transmission routes","Impact":"Mismanagement of vector-borne diseases and ineffective control methods","Mitigation":"Research and education on disease transmission routes and vectors","Technologies":"Microscopy, molecular diagnostics, and epidemiological studies","People":"Public health researchers, entomologists, and epidemiologists","Owner":"Government agencies and research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of environmental management","Impact":"Increased prevalence of vector-borne diseases due to uncontrolled environmental factors","Mitigation":"Implementation of environmental management strategies","Technologies":"Land use planning, waste management, and water resource management","People":"Urban planners, environmental engineers, and public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies and environmental organizations"}]}
